titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: This day was expended rather aimlessly: the day was chilly & dull: & we were somewhat fatigued with our exertions of yesterday. However we walked to Montreux, by a circuitous route through the vineyards, & there had tea in a pretentious shop. We returned by tram to Vevey.
